playwright.description: Playwright MCP server for browser automation and E2E testing. Provides tools to navigate pages, click elements, fill forms, take screenshots, and validate rendered content.

github.description: GitHub MCP server for repository operations, pull request management, issue tracking, and CI/CD pipeline integration. Used to create test-related issues, link test results to PRs, and manage test automation workflows.

gitlab.description: GitLab MCP server for merge request management, pipeline monitoring, and issue tracking. Used to enforce test gates on merge requests and report test results in CI/CD pipelines.

jira.description: Jira MCP server for linking test results to user stories, creating defect tickets from test failures, and tracking QA progress across sprints.
